title: Shaggy's favorite music of 2008
description:
My favorite albums and songs of 2008.


my top 14 albums of the year:

1. Amanda Palmer - Who Killed Amanda Palmer
2. Peter Broderick - Home 
3. Peter Broderick - Float 
4. Beach House - Devotion 
5. The Seven Mile Journey - The Metamorphosis Project 
6. subtractiveLAD - Apparatus
7. A Weather - Cove 
8. The Legendary Pink Dots - Plutonium Blonde 
9.  Nico Muhly - Mothertongue 
10. Svartbag - Svartbag
11. Portishead - Third 
12. STS9 - 2008.10.26 Orpheum Theatre , Flagstaff 
13. Cut Copy - In Ghost Colours
14. Tom Morello: The Nightwatchman - The Fabled City 


Honorable Mentions:

Meredith Monk - Impermanence 
Vampire Weekend - Vampire Weekend 
Thee Silver Mt. Zion Memorial Orchestra & Tra-La-La Band - 13 Blues For Thirteen Moons 
Erik Enocksson - With Its Dark Tail Curled 'Round The Garage 


20 best songs of the year:

1. Peter Broderick - And It's Alright
2. The Seven Mile Journey - Purification - The Journey Transcriptions
3. subtractiveLAD - spoiled honey
4. Amanda Palmer - Ampersand
5. Amanda Palmer - Runs In The Family
6. The Roots - Rising Down (feat. Mos Def & Styles P)
7. Portishead - Machine Gun
8. Thee Silver Mt. Zion Memorial Orchestra & Tra-La-La Band - 1,000,000 Died To Make This Sound
9. Cut Copy - Lights And Music
10. MGMT - Kids
11. Fuck Buttons - Sweet Love For Planet Earth
12. Peter Broderick - Below It
13. The Legendary Pink Dots - Rainbows Too?
14. Modeselektor - Godspeed
15. Fuck Buttons - Colours Move (Mogwai Remix)
16. Portishead - The Rip
17. A Weather - Pinky Toe
18. Beach House - Gila
19. Nas - War Is Necessary
20. The Dodos - Winter
